tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE policy_coverage_details (
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_holder_name VARCHAR(255),
    coverage_type VARCHAR(50),
    coverage_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    coverage_start_date DATE,
    coverage_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE PolicyHolders (
  policy_holder_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_holder_name VARCHAR(255),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  email VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE PolicyPayments (
  payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_id INT,
  payment_date DATE,
  amount DECIMAL,
  payment_method VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Policy (policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 policy_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 policy_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 coverage_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
 start_date DATE NOT NULL,
 end_date DATE NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE PolicyHolder (holder_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 holder_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 holder_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 holder_phone VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE CoverageDetails (coverage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 policy_id INT REFERENCES Policy(policy_id),
 coverage_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 description TEXT)

CREATE TABLE PremiumDetails (premium_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 policy_id INT REFERENCES Policy(policy_id),
 premium_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
 payment_date DATE NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE PolicyDetails (
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_type VARCHAR(50),
    coverage_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);
